Egor Lynov Website

Hi, my name is Egor and this is basic information about me

My birthday is May 31, 1987, and I was born in Voronezh. Koltsov's Gymnasium was where I studied. I got carried away with Olympiad programming at school. As a specialty system programmer, I graduated from Voronezh State University's Faculty of Applied Mathematics and Mechanics. At university, I became interested in functional programming. I've worked as a software engineer since 2012. The following languages and technologies have been used by me in the development of websites, applications, distributed systems and databases.

Stack:

  • Programming Languages:

    • Erlang
    • Scala
